docs.text: Media Servarr List This is a list of useful applications to use for a home media server setup. Contributions welcome! If you think an application should be added to the list, please submit an issue of the application, what it does, and any links that might be useful. Applications Automation Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Bazarr Automates & manages subtitles bazarr.media morpheus65535/bazarr hotio , linuxserver.io CouchPotato Automates & manages movies couchpota.to CouchPotato/CouchPotatoServer Official , linuxserver.io Lidarr Automates & manages music lidarr.audio lidarr/lidarr hotio , linuxserver.io Mylar Automates & manages comics mylar3/mylar3 hotio , linuxserver.io Radarr Automates & manages movies radarr.video Radarr/Radarr hotio , linuxserver.io Readarr Automates & manages books and audiobooks readarr.com Readarr/Readarr hotio Sickbeard Automates downloading tv shows sickbeard.com midgetspy/Sick-Beard/ Official , linuxserver.io SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io Companion Apps Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Cardigann Proxy and API support for torrent trackers cardigann/cardigann Official , linuxserver.io Jackett Proxy and API support for torrent trackers Jackett/Jackett hotio , linuxserver.io Ombi Allows media requests and management ombi.io tidusjar/Ombi hotio , linuxserver.io Overseerr Allows media requests and management sct/overseerr Official , hotio Requestrr A chat bot used to simplify using services darkalfx/requestrr Official , hotio Media Servers Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Emby Media server and organizer emby.media MediaBrowser/Emby Official , linuxserver.io Jellyfin Media server and organizer jellyfin.org jellyfin/jellyfin Official , hotio , linuxserver.io Plex Media server and organizer plex.tv plexinc/pms-docker Official , hotio , linuxserver.io Other Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Commandarr A bot that interacts with Sonarr/Radarr/Lidarr. Commandarr/Commandarr Listrr Creates lists on Trakt for media based on your filters listrr.pro TheUltimateC0der/Listrr Official Logarr Consolidates logs in to a single page Monitorr/logarr Official Monitorr Displays live status of any webapp or service Monitorr/Monitorr Official Organizr HTPC/Homelab services organizer causefx/Organizr Official Syncarr Sync Sonarr/Radarr/Lidarr servers syncarr/syncarr Official Tdarr Video transcoder HaveAGitGat/Tdarr Official theme.park Themes for many applications Technical Ramblings gilbN/theme.park Official Tautulli A web application for monitoring, analytics and notifications for Plex tautulli.com Tautulli/Tautulli Official , hotio , linuxserver.io Traktarr CLI that adds media based on Trakt lists l3uddz/traktarr hotio Unmanic Video transcoder Josh5/unmanic Official

docs.text: Bazarr Bazarr is a companion application to Sonarr and Radarr . It manages and downloads subtitles based on your requirements. You define your preferences by TV show or movie and Bazarr takes care of everything for you. Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io Discord Reddit Notes Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add a note, please open an issue . Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io Radarr Automates & manages movies radarr.video Radarr/Radarr hotio , linuxserver.io Similar Applications None known of. Please open an issue if you know of an alternative.

docs.text: CouchPotato Awesome PVR for usenet and torrents. Just fill in what you want to see and CouchPotato will add it to your "want to watch"-list. Every day it will search through multiple sources, looking for the best possible match. If available, it will send it using your favorite download software. Links Website Download Github Docker Hub Official linuxserver.io Forums Notes It is recommended to use this to proxy all of your torrent trackers for Sonarr , Radarr , Lidarr , etc. I have found that most of the built in ones do not work. Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Cardigann Proxy and API support for torrent trackers cardigann/cardigann Official , linuxserver.io
docs.title: CouchPotato

docs.text: Headphones ![[headphones.png]]{: align=left width=120px height=120px } Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent, written in Python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBget, Transmission, µTorrent, Deluge and Blackhole. Warning Headphones has not had a release since March 2018. It is recommended to use another application found in Similar Applications . If you feel like this is a mistake, please open an issue . docs.text: Jackett Jackett works as a proxy server: it translates queries from apps into tracker-site-specific http queries, parses the html response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping & translation logic - removing the burden from other apps. Links Download Github Support Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io Notes It is recommended to use this to proxy all of your torrent trackers for Sonarr , Radarr , Lidarr , etc. I have found that most of the built in ones do not work. Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub CouchPotato Automates & manages movies couchpota.to CouchPotato/CouchPotatoServer Official , linuxserver.io Lidarr Automates & manages music lidarr.audio lidarr/lidarr hotio , linuxserver.io Mylar Automates & manages comics mylar3/mylar3 hotio , linuxserver.io Radarr Automates & manages movies radarr.video Radarr/Radarr hotio , linuxserver.io Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Cardigann Proxy and API support for torrent trackers cardigann/cardigann Official , linuxserver.io

docs.text: Lidarr Lidarr is a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new albums from your favorite artists and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available. Links Website Github Wiki Download Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io Reddit Notes Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add a note, please open an issue . Works with No apps known of. Please open an issue if you know of an app that this app works with. | Application | Usage | Website | Github | Docker Hub | |-|-|-|-|-| Similar Applications None known of. docs.text: Radarr Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available. Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io API Documentation Discord Reddit Notes Radarr works with both Usenet and Torrents. It is recommended that you use Jackett to proxy your torrent trackers to a format that Sonarr can read. You can use apps Ombi or Overseerr to consolidate requests to a single application and forward the request to Radarr. This makes media management much easier. Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Jackett Proxy and API support for torrent trackers Jackett/Jackett hotio , linuxserver.io Ombi Allows media requests and management ombi.io tidusjar/Ombi hotio , linuxserver.io Overseerr (alpha) Allows media requests and management sct/overseerr Official , hotio theme.park Themes for many applications Technical Ramblings gilbN/theme.park Official Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub CouchPotato Automates & manages movies couchpota.to CouchPotato/CouchPotatoServer Official , linuxserver.io
docs.title: Radarr

docs.text: SickBeard Sick Beard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them, and optionally generates metadata for them. It currently supports several torrent and usenet sites and retrieves show information from theTVDB.com and TVRage.com. Warning Sickbeard has not been in development since March 2016. It is recommended to use another application found in Similar Applications . If you feel like this is a mistake, please open an issue . Info This page is bare and can use more information! If you would like to contribute, please open an issue . Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub Official linuxserver.io Notes Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add a note, please open an issue . Works with Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add an app that works with SickBeard, please open an issue . Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io Sonarr Automates & manages tv shows and anime sonarr.tv Sonarr/Sonarr hotio , linuxserver.io

docs.text: SickChill SickChill is an automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic: automatic torrent/nzb searching, downloading, and processing at the qualities you want. Info This page is bare and can use more information! If you would like to contribute, please open an issue . Links Website Download Github Docker Hub Official linuxserver.io Notes Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add a note, please open an issue . Works with Nothing to display here at this time. If you would like to add an app that works with SickChill, please open an issue . docs.title: Similar Applications

docs.text: Sonarr Sonarr is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort, and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available. Links Website Download Github Wiki Docker Hub hotio linuxserver.io API Documentation Forums Discord Reddit Twitter Notes Sonarr works with both Usenet and Torrents. It is recommended that you use Jackett to proxy your torrent trackers to a format that Sonarr can read. You can use apps Ombi or Overseerr to consolidate requests to a single application and forward the request to Sonarr. This makes media management much easier. Works with Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Jackett Proxy and API support for torrent trackers Jackett/Jackett hotio , linuxserver.io Ombi Allows media requests and management ombi.io tidusjar/Ombi hotio , linuxserver.io Overseerr (alpha) Allows media requests and management sct/overseerr Official , hotio theme.park Themes for many applications Technical Ramblings gilbN/theme.park Official Similar Applications Application Usage Website Github Docker Hub Sickbeard Automates downloading tv shows sickbeard.com midgetspy/Sick-Beard/ Official , linuxserver.io SickChill Automates & manages tv shows and anime sickchill.github.io SickChill/SickChill Official , linuxserver.io

It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.

docs.text: Sonarr works with both Usenet and Torrents. It is recommended that you use Jackett to proxy your torrent trackers to a format that Sonarr can read. You can use apps Ombi or Overseerr to consolidate requests to a single application and forward the request to Sonarr. This makes media management much easier.
